submission:
class Solution(object):
    def maxOperations(self, s):
        """
        :type s: str
        :rtype: int
        """
        s += "1"
        runs = []
        count = 1
        last = s[0]
        for i in range(1, len(s)):
            if s[i] != last:
                if last=="1":
                    runs.append(count)
                count = 1
                last = s[i]
            else:
                count += 1
        if last == "1":
            runs.append(count)
        
        ans = 0
        runs = runs[::-1]
        while len(runs) > 1:
            v = runs.pop()
            ans += v
            runs[-1] += v
        
        return ans
